summary:
CSS is a special language used to make websites look good and work well. It helps separate the important information (like text) from how it looks (like colors and fonts). This makes websites easier to read and faster to load.

With CSS, you can make sure websites look great on different screens, like computers, phones, and printers. It also allows for cool effects and styles, so each website can be unique. The rules of CSS are set by a group called the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
title: CSS
